mapper.insert: insert into fund_position (code, transaction_date, initiation_date, total_amount, total_purchase_fee, held_share, held_days, update_date) select #{code}, #{transactionDate}, #{initiationDate}, #{totalAmount}, #{totalPurchaseFee}, #{heldShare}, #{heldDays}, #{updateDate} from dual where not exists ( select total_amount, total_purchase_fee, held_share from fund_position where code = #{code} and transaction_date = #{transactionDate} and initiation_date = #{initiationDate} and total_amount = #{totalAmount} and total_purchase_fee = #{totalPurchaseFee} and held_share = #{heldShare} )
